Thank you for considering reaching out to me.

To ensure prompt response, please use the following methods for best communication:

[**Post questions as comments**]{style="color: red"} on the relevant article to benefit other readers and avoid duplication. [**Email inquiries will not be addressed**]{style="color: red"}, but redirected to the comments section.

Report mistakes, bugs, or inaccuracies by [**creating an issue on**]{style="color: red"} [GitHub](https://github.com/NING3739). For those familiar with GitHub, feel free to edit the file and submit a pull request for speedy incorporation of your changes.

Before contacting me, please [**check the comments section**]{style="color: red"} for a possible answer to your question.

Thank you!
